title: creds
description: An instance of using creds to access a resource.

email.description: The email address used to identify the user.

user.description: The user name used to identify the user.

phone.description: The phone number used to identify the user.

passwdhash.description: The password hash used to authenticate.

account.description: The account that the creds allow access to.

website.description: The base URL of the website that the credentials allow access to.

host.description: The host that the credentials allow access to.

wifi:ssid.description: The WiFi SSID that the credentials allow access to.

web:acct.description: The web account that the credentials allow access to.
